title: Ariana Lucci 14K Gold Filled 3mm Italian-Made Loose Rope Chain Necklace for Women and Men, Non Tarnish, Thick Twisted Rope Design, Timeless Classic Jewelry, Choose Length 16"-36"
features: Made of 14K gold filled: A heavy covering of genuine 14K gold along the chain's surface is much thicker than standard gold plated jewelry, so it won't fade or tarnish like thinner gold-plated jewelry typically would. In fact, as a result of this thick coating, every necklace is guaranteed to have at least 5% genuine 14K gold in its metal content.

The loose rope chain style is a timeless classic, and its 3 mm links are dainty but not thin, perfect for wearing on its own as a necklace along with any outfit, or for adding a large pendant or medallion charm. Our 14k gold-filled jewelry is sturdier and more durable than most solid gold or sterling silver jewelry pieces on the market today.

You or your special someone can wear this necklace for any occasion. It is available in length sizes 16", 18", 20", 22", 24", 30", and 36". Please measure your preferred length before ordering to ensure a perfect fit. Necklace lengths are measured from end to end, including the clasp and connector.

The high-quality lobster claw clasp makes for quick and easy wear on the go, while being safely secured around your neck. Its thick covering of genuine 14K gold on the surface lets you wear it all day without worry, to the gym, beach, shower, work, etc.

Every piece of Ariana Lucci jewelry is stamped '1/20 14K GF' and 'ITALY' to ensure you're getting authentic quality and value. Ariana Lucci 14K gold-filled jewelry allows for the same look and feel as real genuine 14K yellow gold jewelry but without the high price.
description: At Ariana Lucci Italian Jewelry we pride ourselves on the highest standards of quality manufacturing. As a result, the quality of our jewelry from Italy is far superior to other brands' products that are imported from Asia and the typical Far East manufacturing regions. Our proprietary thick gold plating, and high-quality design and construction ensure your jewellery looks as good as the day you bought it, for years to come. No matter the outfit you are wearing, you can elevate your look in no time with the 14k Gold-filled Loose Rope Chain Necklace from Ariana Lucci. This timeless, elegant necklace comprises many interconnected links in a rope chain design, with a high-quality lobster claw clasp closure that offers easy on and off, so it's simple and easy to put on when you get ready for your day, as well as to take off when you're relaxing at home.
